summary:
After years in corporate environment, I am excited to announce that I am starting my business.

After 20 years of successful business management in the IT industry, after 12 years as a Chief Mother Officier of 2 fantastic children and after 2 years of pandemic with a couple of lockdowns giving me the opportunity to explore the undersides of school curses and education , I found the perfect way to bring those 3 expertises together. 

The opportunity to be part of facilitators amongst the parents of the amazing @International School of Amsterdam allowed me to interact with teachers, staff,  many international communities, students and parents and learn from them. I enjoy helping and bringing people together, helping organizing events and share our culture with students and parents. 
I also enjoy seeing smile on the face of children when they explore new areas of learnings, how fabulous it is to see the excitement of them having fun, because playing is also at the center of their world. 

Those last couple of months of break made me realize what I always really wanted ! Start my business and contribute in a positive way to our children and our world. 

My personal project consiste in organizing for our children's (and adults)  a brand-new and innovative way of moving & learning thanks to technology working on 4 pillars : focus, active engagement, feedbacks and consolidation. 
Learn
Educational
Autonomous
Reflective 
Neuro-science
Orientation
LEARN-O  is the new concept.

We need to listen more to our kids and embrace the future with values of the past : the new era of LEARNING.
Repetition makes perfection, so here is your opportunity to combine educational and activities simultaneously.

profile_positions.description:
A french innovative learning system combining physical activity (movements), intellectual practice and technology in a brand new and fun way.

Our main goal is to ally in a playful environment both of the world : cognitive skills and physical skills. It is knows that through the game, we develop several skills.
The game allows to develop your physical capacity, your focus, your motricity, your memory, your orientation skills, your strategy and independency. It helps to socialize, collaborate and win alone or within a group. It helps to work on your knowledges and discover others through the kinesthetic aspect of learning.

Based on multiple intelligences (H. Gardner), Learn-O is also based on the four pillars of learning according to neuroscience (S. Dehaene): 
- Attention, 
- Active Engagement,
- Immediate Feedback,
- Consolidation.

Thousand of challenges available for children, adults or senior, for valid or handicapt people.

Organized outside or inside, the game is open to everyone from 3 to 103 years old. Whether you are competitive or not, you can participate, it's your choice ! 

Available for schools, corporates, sport events, retirement home, reeducation center, gymnasium, summer camps, handicap center, BSO, afterschool care, celebration (birthday, wedding...)...

Come and discover this multidisciplinary game during which you will have so much fun !!!!
profile_positions.title: Owner

profile_positions.description:
The role of a stay-at-home parent is a vital and multifaceted job that involves caring for and nurturing children full-time while managing various household responsibilities. Here is a general description of the role: 
1/Childcare: The primary responsibility of a stay-at-home parent is to care for & support the children's physical, emotional, and intellectual development. This includes tasks such as feeding, bathing, dressing, and ensuring their safety. It also involves engaging in activities that promote learning, socialization, and play. 
2/Education & Development: take an active role in my children's education and development. I engage in activities that support early literacy, teach basic math concepts, facilitate art projects, and encourage curiosity and exploration. I create an enriching environment that fosters intellectual growth and helps children reach developmental milestones.
3/Emotional Support: Nurturing emotional well-being is an essential aspect of the role. I provide a loving and supportive environment, offering comfort, encouragement, and guidance. I help my children manage their emotions, resolve conflicts, and develop healthy relationships with family members and peers. 
4/Household Management: responsible for managing various household tasks. This includes meal planning and preparation, grocery shopping, cleaning, laundry, and organizing home. 
5/ Scheduling & Logistics: chief scheduler and coordinator. I organize and manage appointments, playdates, extracurricular activities, and other commitments.
6/Financial Management: also involved in managing the family's finances. I handle bill payments, handle budgets and make financial decisions. 
It's important to note that the role of a stay-at-home parent is a demanding and rewarding job that requires dedication, patience, and a deep love for children. While it may not involve formal employment outside the home, it is a significant contribution to the family.
profile_positions.title: Stay-at-Home Parent

profile_positions.description:
My role is splitted in 2 missions : on one hand I have to manage a portfolio of customers, develop new business with new prospects, reporting, forecasting, business-case analysis, work in partnership with audio service provider and Cisco UC partners. Also participating into answer of tender/RFP/RFI. 
On the other hand, my mission is to support General Account Manager at Cisco and partners who would have a WebEx, Spark and/or Collaboration project. Our goal is to present the services, the value proposition and advise on the best model for the customer or prospect.
profile_positions.title: Enterprise Account Manager & Collaboration Product Sales Specialist

volunteer_experiences.role: Parents Teacher Association/French Speaking Community Representative
volunteer_experiences.description:
I am honored to be  part of the Country Community Representatives at the International School of Amsterdam. 
My mission consists mainly in centralizing and sharing all news and events happening in school , welcoming new families, coordinating and co-organizing international event where France or french speaking countries are represented and connecting the community together.
We also provide a nice and safe place where each member of the community can ask question, express itself, share advise or promote something. 
Very proud of creating a great and strong french speaking community !

Parent Advisory Council is established by school in order to bring together parents/legal guardians/care takers, teachers/staff and community stakeholders to work with their school principal.
The PAC meets approx once per month to discuss various issues relating to education and school.
The PAC is Advisory and had in charge welcoming new families, organizing grade level parent meetings and being the grade level liaison 
The PAC acts like as a channel of communication between the school and the parents.
This year has been special as Grade 5 represents the last year of Primary School. I am excited and delighted to participate in the organization of the year end graduation ceremony hosting 100 students, 200+ family members, 30+ teachers and staff members. 
A large project in cooperation with the school

Skills: attention to details · Communication · Time Management · Budget Management · Business Relationship Management · Project management · Organisation leadership · Creativity
